problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,BC=4,AC=8,点D是AC上一个动点,以AB为对角线的所有平行四边形ADBE中,线段DE的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, BC = N_1, AC = N_2, point D is the last moving point of AC, and in all parallelograms ADBE with AB as the diagonal, the minimum value of the line segment DE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵在Rt△ABC中,∠B=90°,∴BC⊥AC．∵四边形ADBE是平行四边形,∴OD=OE,OA=OB．∴当OD取最小值时,DE线段最短,此时OD⊥BC．∴OD∥CB．又点O是AB的中点,∴OD是△ABC的中位线,∴OD=\frac{1}{2}CB=2,∴ED=2OD=4．故选:A．
